QuestData.Title: Onward to the Blasted Lands
QuestData.Description: We appreciate your assistance here in this swamp, $n. I would like to inform you that I have received correspondence from Nethergarde Keep.$b$bEnohar Thunderbrew has requested help in investigating the shipwrecks of the Red Reaches, but we have had none willing to make the journey, and I could not leave the Harborage.$B$BNethergarde Keep sits in the Blasted Lands, south of the Swamp of Sorrows. Do not journey too close to Stonard on your way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Journey to the Blasted Lands and speak with Enohar Thunderbrew in Nethergarde Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, has Avuun sent ye? Good, good...
